variables.description: The name of the error document for the website.
variables.name: ErrorDocument

variables.description: The name of the index document for the website.
variables.name: IndexDocument

variables.description: The redirect behavior for every request to this bucket's website endpoint.
variables.name: RedirectAllRequestsTo
variables.type: Amazon S3 Website       Configuration Redirect All Requests To Property

variables.description: Rules that define when a redirect is applied and the redirect behavior.
variables.name: RoutingRules
variables.type: Amazon S3 Website Configuration       Routing Rules Property
